The Life of Solina - The Royal Archives of Aden:
It is impossible to exaggerate the seriousness of the consequences of these tragic events: the emperor lost popular support, and the kingdom of Elmoreden entered an era of irreversible decline. Subsequently, the surviving disciples and followers of SOLINA gathered in the monastery, locked the doors and stopped communicating with the outside world.
Since then, in the kingdom of Elmoreden appeared a secret society called Embryo, which had a great influence on certain parts of the continent. The Kingdom of Elmoreden, after the Emperor of Frintez concluded a contract with evil spirits and went to the Tomb of the Empire, was destroyed. So the first united kingdom of people went down in history.
